info.name: Silver Bookstore - Complete API (Accounts + Products)
info.description: Complete API collection for Silver Bookstore - Accounts & Products apps with Customer and Dashboard flows

request.description: Refresh the access token using refresh token
Get detailed information about a specific teacher
Get detailed information about a specific product
Update quantity of an item in cart
Create an order from cart items
Get details of a specific order
Get all orders for current user
Apply a coupon code to an order
List ratings and reviews for products

Create a new category with form-data (for image upload). To upload an image: 1. Ensure body type is 'formdata' 2. Set 'image' field type to 'File' 3. Click file picker and select your image 4. Send request

Update a category with form-data (for image upload). To upload an image: 1. Enable the 'name' field if you want to update the name 2. Set 'image' field type to 'File' 3. Click file picker and select your image 4. Send request
Create a new teacher with form-data (for image upload)
Update a teacher with form-data (for image upload)

formdata.value: Complete guide to algebra basics and advanced concepts

request.description: Create a new product with form-data (for PDF and image upload). To upload files: 1. Ensure body type is 'formdata' 2. Set 'pdf_file' and 'base_image' field types to 'File' 3. Click file picker for each file 4. Send request

Update a product with form-data (for PDF and image upload). To update files: 1. Enable the text fields you want to update 2. Set 'pdf_file' and 'base_image' field types to 'File' 3. Click file picker to upload new files 4. Send request
Create a new product image with form-data (for image upload)
Update a product image with form-data (for image upload)
Create a new special product with form-data (for image upload)
Update a special product with form-data (for image upload)
Create a new best product with form-data (for image upload)
Update a best product with form-data (for image upload)
Get detailed information about an order
Update order status (i=initiated, w=waiting, p=paid, d=done)
